F001.question: Who can use HELPS?
F001.answer: Any student enrolled in any faculty at UTS, and all members of UTS staff

F002.question: Where is HELPS?
F002.answer: HELPS is located on Building 1, Level 3 , room 8 (opposite the Careers service)

F003.question: How much does it cost?
F003.answer: Services are free of tuition fees for non-credit workshops and individual consultations.

F004.question: Can you help me with my assignment?
F004.answer: Yes. HELPS offers various workshops and individual consultations. For more information, check out our website

F005.question: Can you proofread and correct my assignment?
F005.answer: No. Our role is not to correct grammar or other errors in an assignment. We can help you develop your own editing strategies. You should also use a computer spell-check, find a competent friend and a good dictionary.

F006.question: Can you help me with the content of my assignment?
F006.answer: No. We can’t tell you what to say, we can only help you say it better and more clearly. While we’re happy to act as a sounding board for your ideas, content questions require the specialised disciplinary knowledge of lecturers and tutors in your faculty. You should take specific content questions directly to them.
